channel.title: --[317/508] Realm Of Fury - PK|ECO perfected 24/7--
channel.description:
[CENTER][IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/logo.png[/img]
Server is 317 with 508 mapdata and 637 items!
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Links.png[/img] [URL=http://"http://www.rofonline.com/"]WEBSITE[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.rofonline.com/votepage.html"]WEBCLIENT[/URL] [URL=http://"http://www.mediafire.com/?fflauqaxg70252y"]Download Client[/URL]
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Welcome.png[/img]
Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Realm Of Fury - RSPS server. This thread includes most of the information about the server.
RoF is Economy / pk based server with lot's of fun stuff to do!
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Whatwegot.png[/img]
- 24/7 active community with active staffmembers. - Only professional staff members with the most and the best knowledge around! - Custom minigames and training places! - Donator area with custom donator shops and extra NPC's to train with! - Duel arena and castlewars! - Active PvP and PvM community! - Working Clan Chat with lootsharing! - PK point store with chaotic weapons and claws! (an lot's of other goodies!) - Slayer points! (Tasks are: Easy, Normal and hard tasks. Hard tasks for faster lvl) - Active forums with lot's of ingame information and handwritten guides by others! - All the skills exept dungeoneering! (Dungeoneering is soon done!) - Vote for cash and Refer a friend for cash system! - Nomad - Jad - Corporal Beast - King Black Dragon - lot's of commands (in game do ::commands for them.) - BEAUTIFUL ECONOMY! - Webclient and Downloadable client! - Summoning with familiars! - Chaotic, Vesta, barrows armors/weps, Claws ETC! - AND MUCH MORE!
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/Media.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-11-3022-37-42-13.png[/img] [IMG]http://i1358.photobucket.com/albums/q763/Wyreladez/javaw2012-12-0100-56-14-02.png[/img] item.title: --[317/508] Realm Of Fury - PK|ECO perfected 24/7--
item.dc:creator: @wyrelade wyrelade
item.description:
@wyrelade wrote:

[CENTER]

Server is 317 with 508 mapdata and 637 items!


WEBSITE
WEBCLIENT
Download Client

Welcome to the official advertisement thread of Realm Of Fury - RSPS server.
This thread includes most of the information about the server.

RoF is Economy / pk based server with lot’s of fun stuff to do!

  • 24/7 active community with active staffmembers.
  • Only professional staff members with the most and the best knowledge around!
  • Custom minigames and training places!
  • Donator area with custom donator shops and extra NPC’s to train with!
  • Duel arena and castlewars!
  • Active PvP and PvM community!
  • Working Clan Chat with lootsharing!
  • PK point store with chaotic weapons and claws! (an lot’s of other goodies!)
  • Slayer points! (Tasks are: Easy, Normal and hard tasks. Hard tasks for faster lvl)
  • Active forums with lot’s of ingame information and handwritten guides by others!
  • All the skills exept dungeoneering! (Dungeoneering is soon done!)
  • Vote for cash and Refer a friend for cash system!
  • Nomad
  • Jad
  • Corporal Beast
  • King Black Dragon
  • lot’s of commands (in game do ::commands for them.)
  • BEAUTIFUL ECONOMY!
  • Webclient and Downloadable client!
  • Summoning with familiars!
  • Chaotic, Vesta, barrows armors/weps, Claws ETC!
  • AND MUCH MORE!

























[/CENTER]

Read full topic
